thread.section_title: PC Game Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PC Game Supply | www.pcgamesupply.com
thread.title: Brice W.
thread.title_full: PC Game Supply reviewed by Brice W.

author: Brice W.
title: Brice W.
text: I will admit I was a little leery at first, but the site came recommended from PSN support directly. There was a little more extra account validation that I admit I really didn't expect and found a little annoying at the time, but in hindsight a little extra security doesn't hurt. The electronic codes were available immediately and redeemed without issue.
